changeSet.author: jjhanso
changeSet.comment: set up custom function type for KRMS and TKLM

column.name: NM
column.value: KPME Java Function Term Resolver Service

column.name: DESC_TXT
column.value: Check to see if document or object contains the passed in department

column.name: TYP_ID
column.valueComputed: (select TYP_ID from KRMS_TYP_T where NM='KPME Java Function Term Service' and NMSPC_CD='KPME-KRMS')

column.name: DESC_TXT
column.value: Check to see if document or object contains the passed in work area

column.name: TYP_ID
column.valueComputed: (select TYP_ID from KRMS_TYP_T where NM='KPME Java Function Term Service' and NMSPC_CD='KPME-KRMS')

column.name: DESC_TXT
column.value: Check to see if document or object contains the passed in job number

column.name: TYP_ID
column.valueComputed: (select TYP_ID from KRMS_TYP_T where NM='KPME Java Function Term Service' and NMSPC_CD='KPME-KRMS')

column.name: FUNC_ID
column.valueComputed: (select FUNC_ID from KRMS_FUNC_T where NM='containsDept' and NMSPC_CD='KPME-KRMS')
